alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: AIShield - TimeSeries Forecasting model extraction vulnerability detected.
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: This query detects TimeSeries Forecasting model extraction vulnerability alert from AIShield generated at {{TimeGenerated}}\n\nPlease check the source for more information and investigate further.

properties.query:
AIShield
| where Message has 'TimeSeries Forecasting AI Model Extraction Attack Identified'
| where Severity =~ 'High'
| extend NTDomain = tostring(split(Computer, '\\')[0]), HostName = tostring(split(Computer, '.')[0])
properties.name: AIShield - TimeSeries Forecasting model extraction vulnerability detection
properties.description: 'This alert creates an incident when TimeSeries Forecasting model extraction vulnerability detected from the AIShield.'
